text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 1.32.3, Servicewide Travel Policies and Procedures, Managerial Cost Accounting.

The material relating to Managerial Cost Accounting previously contained in IRM 1.32.3, Servicewide Travel Policies and Procedures, Managerial Cost Accounting, has moved to IRM 1.35.16, Financial Accounting, Managerial Cost Accounting. The information has been moved to improve documentation and ensure material is aligned in the appropriate section.
Business unit finance offices and employees responsible for management of program activities and cost activities.
